articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: 3 mountain lions killed after feeding on human remains
articles.description: Three mountain lions found feeding on human remains near a popular Arizona hiking trail have been killed
articles.content:
TUCSON, Ariz. -- 
Three mountain lions found feeding on human remains near a popular Tucson hiking trail have been killed, Arizona authorities said Wednesday. 
They were not suspected of killing the person, but were determined to be a danger to the public b… [+597 chars]

articles.title: White nationalist who ran for Senate arrested in Florida
articles.description: Jail records described Augustus Sol Invictus as an “out of state fugitive.”
articles.content:
MELBOURNE, Fla. -- 
A white nationalist who ran for the U.S. Senate in Florida and was a featured speaker during the 2017 Unite the Right rally in Charlottesville, Virginia, was arrested on charges of kidnapping and domestic violence.

articles.title: Police: Couple dead in Puerto Rico catamaran fire from US
articles.description: Authorities in Puerto Rico have identified a couple they say died when their catamaran caught on fire at a marina in the island’s southwest region
articles.content:
SAN JUAN -- 
Authorities in Puerto Rico on Wednesday identified a couple they say died when their catamaran caught on fire at a marina in the islands southwest region.

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Report: Texas man not armed when killed by police officer
articles.description: A report that police in Temple, Texas, filed with the state's attorney general says a man who was fatally shot last month by an officer didn't have a weapon
articles.content:
TEMPLE, Texas -- 
A report that police in Temple, Texas, filed with the state's attorney general says a man who was fatally shot last month by an officer did not have a weapon.
Police have released little information since the Dec. 2 shooting in Temple, abo… [+987 chars]

articles.title: Woman apparently killed by celebratory gunfire on New Year's: Police
articles.description: A Houston woman was shot and killed outside her home during New Year's Eve celebrations, according to authorities.
articles.content:
A Houston woman was shot and killed outside her home during New Year's Eve celebrations, according to authorities.

articles.author: BRIAN MAHONEY AP Basketball Writer
articles.title: David Stern, NBA’s commissioner for 30 years, dies at 77
articles.description: Stern suffered a brain hemorrhage Dec. 12 and underwent emergency surgery.
articles.content:
NEW YORK -- 
David Stern, who spent 30 years as the NBA's longest-serving commissioner and oversaw its growth into a global power, has died on New Years Day. He was 77.
The league says Stern died Wednesday with his family by his side. He suffered a brain he… [+715 chars]
